alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:56PM EST until January 11 at 8:43AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday morning and continue to a crest of 20.7 feet by Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage by early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
